Paragraph.Text: The MK2 Solar Panel is a power generator 3m wide, 3m long and 1m tall. Place 9 solar panel components in this layout to construct the machine. It must have direct access to sunlight above it.
This power generation machine can only be placed on top of advanced machines such as the Research Laboratory, Refinery, Cargo Lifts and MK4 & MK5 Power Storage Systems.
